function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Overcrowding and close proximity of individuals in buildings can contribute to rapid disease spread.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of targeted, non-coercive community interventions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incomplete or inaccurate communication from health authorities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conducting mass gatherings and events without restrictions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Institutional quarantining overwhelmed system leading to more infections","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Funerals conducted in homes leading to transmission of viruses","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Timing of community mitigation measures impacting effectiveness","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global spread of covid-19 pandemic with over 107 million infections and 2.4 million deaths worldwide.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Socio-economic and region-specific factors associated with the spread of covid-19 at an ecological level.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"}]}
